name: Space Raiders (itch) (Spicy Chicken, Robo-octo, Pixel Overload)
name_original: Space Raiders (itch) (Spicy Chicken, Robo-octo, Pixel Overload)
description:
Pilot your own intergalactic space-craft and use it to evade many space-hazards on your travels such as bullets, minions that hunt you, and powerful boss attacks! Your goal is to get past the aliens in your way so you can make an important delivery.  WARNING: Space raiders has a tendency to crash and cause some minor 'glitches'.

Use the arrow keys to move your ship around. The space-bar can be used to dash which makes your ship temporarily immune to damage as you launch forward. 

If you are experiencing any 'glitches' with space raiders we wish you the best of luck in overcoming any odd difficulties.
